mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /* insertAttachFile */ T_PMS005 (atcht_fl_no, atcht_fl_path_nm, atcht_fl_nm, atcht_fl_orgnl_nm, rgt_tm, rgtr_id, upt_tm, uptr_id) VALUES (#{atchtFlNo}, #{atchtFlPathNm}, #{atchtFlNm}, #{atchtFlOrgnlNm}, NOW(), #{rgtrId}, NOW(), #{uptrId})
mapper.delete: DELETE /* deleteAttachFile */ FROM T_PMS005 WHERE atcht_fl_no = #{atchtFlNo}
